conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a police movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: I'd highly recommend checking out "Lethal Weapon 3". It's an action-packed cop movie starring Mel Gibson and Danny Glover, where they take on a former police officer turned illegal arms dealer. Another great option is "World Trade Center" - this one tells the true story of two Port Authority officers who survived the 9/11 attacks, featuring powerful performances by Nicolas Cage and Jay Hernandez. Enjoy the films!
